FERModel¶

class fermodel.FERModel(target_emotions, train_images=None, train_labels=None, csv_data_path=None, raw_dimensions=None, csv_label_col=None, csv_image_col=None, verbose=False)[source]¶

Deep learning model for facial expression recognition. Model chosen dependent on set of target emotions supplied by user.

Parameters:
  • target_emotions – set of target emotions to classify
  • train_images – numpy array of training images
  • csv_data_path – local path to directory containing csv with image pixel values
  • verbose – if true, will print out extra process information
POSSIBLE_EMOTIONS = ['anger', 'fear', 'calm', 'sad', 'happy', 'surprise']¶
predict(images)[source]¶
train()[source]¶

Trains FERModel on supplied image data.
